lead_paragraph: GILLETTE--Joan, of New York, NY, 81, on February 2, 2016 of complications from cancer. Joan was the daughter of the late Helen and Leonard Glickman. Joan married Stanley C. Gillette with whom she had a daughter, Patty Gillette of Sleepy Hollow, NY. For 40 years Joan and Stan had a loving and happy marriage. Following Stan's death, Joan found love again with Bob Pitofsky, to whom she had been engaged when she was 18. Joan is survived by her daughter Patty, her stepson Richard Gillette, her grandchildren Kyle and Blake Norman, Jasara Myles and Holly Martin and four great-grandchildren. Memorial service Sunday, February 7, 1pm at "The Riverside," 76th Street and Amsterdam Ave. Donations in her memory to Memorial Sloane Kettering at https://giving.mskcc.org/find -and-donate-giving-page. 1/3
